alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 9:24PM PST until December 24 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible, along with difficult travel on Interstate 84 and Route 204. Power outages and tree damage may occur due to the ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
